sentences.en: BUA, SOS and STI in men were greater than in women in different ages.
sentences.cn: 各年龄组的BUA 、 SOS和STI男性均高于女性.
他用无线电发送了两遍SOS信号.

sentences.en: International SOS members should call the number on their membership cards for assistance.
sentences.cn: 如果是国际SOS组织 的成员应及时拨打成员卡上的电话以寻求帮助.

sentences.en: International SOS will require a global mindset.
sentences.cn: 国际SOS将需要应聘者具有全球性思维.

sentences.en: Moreover, 25 % of SOS children mention that they are sad.
sentences.cn: 而且, 25%的SOS孩子提及到了悲伤.

sentences.en: No significant change of SOS was found in the control group after treatment ( P > 0.05 ).
sentences.cn: 对照组与治疗前比较,所测SOS值无明显变化 ( P>0.05 ).

sentences.en: Results [ WTBZ ] BUA and SOS were lower in all patients with hyperthyroidism than in controls ( P < 0.01 )
sentences.cn: 结果甲状腺功能亢进症组的BUA和SOS均明显降低,与对照组比较,差异有极显著性 ( P<0.01 ).

sentences.en: She stamped out the letters'sOS'in the snow.
sentences.cn: 她用脚在雪地踩出'sOS'这三个字母.

sentences.en: She stamped out the letters'SOS'in the snow.
sentences.cn: 她用脚在雪地踩出' sos '这三个字母.

sentences.en: So they were asked to draw their SOS families.
sentences.cn: 所以他们被告知的是书画SOS的家庭.

sentences.en: The captain found it necessary to send an SOS signal.
sentences.cn: 船长察觉到必须发出求救信号.

sentences.en: The ferry did not even have time to send out an SOS.
sentences.cn: 这艘渡船甚至没有时间发出紧急呼救信号。

sentences.en: The rest of these children have drawn themselves far away from their SOS mothers.
sentences.cn: 这个测试中孩子把自己画的远离SOS的妈妈.

sentences.en: The results obtained in the SOS Chromotest are the same as the results in Ames test.
sentences.cn: SOS显色试验结果与Ames试验结果一致.

trans.tran_cn: si opus sit (Latin=when needed) （拉丁语）必要时，silicon-on-sapphire 硅-蓝宝石（技术），save our savings 节约我们的储蓄，save our streets 保留我们的街道

trans.tran_en: An SOS is a signal which indicates to other people that you are in danger and need help quickly
